document.docAuthor: Robert, Rolando, Lee, Dexter Jiunn Herng, Rodrigues, Kenneth Francis, Hussein, Muhammad Ali Syed, Waheed, Zarinah & Kumar, S. Vijay
document.masterDocTitle: Consolidated Checklist of Hard Corals of the Genus Acropora Oken, 1815 (Scleractinia: Acroporidae) in North Borneo, East Malaysia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Consolidated Checklist of Hard Corals of the Genus Acropora Oken, 1815 (Scleractinia: Acroporidae) in North Borneo, East Malaysia

heading.emphasis:
Checklist of
Acropora
of North Borneo

subSubSection.paragraph:
Here, we report 83 species of
Acropora
in North Borneo; 79 have been corroborated with vouchers comprised of 180 specimens from IPMB-MRC (museum abbreviation: IPMB-C), 170 from BRI, and 98 from MTQ ( Table 3 ). Depth records were available for most of the vouchers and the species reported in Wood and Tan (1987), which are given in range. Photographs of the vouchers are included as an attachment at the end of this paper. The systematic arrangement of
Acropora
is as follows:
Phylum: Cnidaria
Class: Anthozoa
Subclass: Hexacorallia

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Family:
Acroporidae Verrill 1902
Genus:
Acropora Oken 1815
Type species:
Acropora muricata ( Linnaeus 1758 ) No .
Species Documented distribution in North Borneo Depth range Figure
